words.id: Thaa siin miim
words.en: Ta Seem Meem

translations.text: Taa-Seeen-Meeem

words.id: ini||ayat-ayat||Kitab||yang nyata
words.en: These||(are the) Verses||(of) the Book||the clear

translations.text: Tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil mubeen

words.id: Kami membacakan||kepadamu/atasmu||dari||kisah||Musa||dan Fir'aun||dengan benar||untuk kaum/orang-orang||mereka beriman
words.en: We recite||to you||from||(the) news||(of) Musa||and Firaun||in truth||for a people||who believe

translations.text: Natloo alaika min naba-i Moosaa Wa-Fir'awna bilhaqqi liqawminy yu'miinoon

words.id: sesungguhnya||Fir'aun||sombong/berbuat sewenang-wenang||di||muka bumi||dan dia menjadikan||penduduknya||berpecah-belah||dia melemahkan/menindas||segolongan||diantara mereka||dia menyembelih||anak laki-laki mereka||dan dia membiarkan hidup||perempuan mereka||sesungguhnya dia/Fir'aun||adalah dia||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang berbuat kerusakan
words.en: Indeed||Firaun||exalted himself||in||the land||and made||its people||(into) sects||oppressing||a group||among them||slaughtering||their sons||and letting live||their women||Indeed he||was||of||the corrupters

translations.text: inna Fir'awna 'alaa fil ardi Wa-ja'ala ahlahaa shiya'ai yastad'ifu taaa'ifatam minhum yuzabbihu abnaaa'ahum Wa-yastahyee nisaaa'ahum; innahoo kaana minal mufsideen

words.id: dan Kami hendak||bahwa||Kami memberi karunia||atas||orang-orang yang||(mereka) ditindas||di||muka bumi||dan Kami akan menjadikan mereka||pemimpin||dan Kami akan menjadikan mereka||orang-orang yang mewarisi
words.en: And We wanted||to||bestow a favor||upon||those who||were oppressed||in||the land||and make them||leaders||and make them||the inheritors

translations.text: Wa-nureedu an namunna 'alal lazeenas tud'ifoo fil ardi Wa-naj'alahum a'immatanw Wa-naj'alahumul waariseen

words.id: dan Kami teguhkan||bagi mereka||di||muka bumi||dan Kami perlihatkan||Fir'aun||dan Haman||dan bala tentara keduanya||dari mereka||apa yang||mereka adalah||mereka khawatirkan
words.en: And [We] establish||them||in||the land||and show||Firaun||and Haman||and their hosts||through them||what||they were||fearing

translations.text: Wa-numakkina lahum fil ardi Wa-nuriya Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junoodahumaa minhum maa kaanoo yahzaroon

words.id: dan kami memberi wahyu/ilham||kepada||ibu||Musa||agar||susukanlah dia||maka apabila||kamu takut||atasnya/terhadapnya||maka jatuhkanlah dia||di||sungai||dan jangan||kamu takut||dan jangan||kamu bersedih hati||sesungguhnya kami||mengembalikan dia||kepadamu||dan menjadikannya||dari/termasuk||para Rasul
words.en: And We inspired||[to]||(the) mother||(of) Musa||that||Suckle him||but when||you fear||for him||then cast him||in(to)||the river||and (do) not||fear||and (do) not||grieve||Indeed We||(will) restore him||to you||and (will) make him||of||the Messengers

translations.text: Wa-awhainaaa ilaaa ummi Moosaaa an ardi'eehi faizaa khifti alaihi fa-alqeehi fil yammi Wa-laa takhaafee Wa-laa tahzaneee innaa raaaddoohu ilaiki Wa-jaa'iloohu minal mursaleen

words.id: maka memungutnya||keluarga||Fir'aun||agar dia adalah/menjadi||bagi mereka||musuh||dan kesedihan||sesungguhnya||Fir'aun||dan Haman||dan bala tentara keduanya||adalah mereka||orang-orang yang bersalah
words.en: Then picked him up||(the) family||(of) Firaun||so that he might become||to them||an enemy||and a grief||Indeed||Firaun||and Haman||and their hosts||were||sinners

translations.text: Faltaqatahooo Aalu Fir'awna li-yakoona lahum 'aduwwanw Wa-hazanaa; inna Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junooda-humaa kaanoo khaati'een

words.id: dan berkata||isteri||Fir'aun||penyejuk||mata||bagiku||dan bagimu||jangan||kamu membunuhnya||mudah-mudahan||dia akan||memberi manfaat kepada kita||atau||kita ambil dia||anak||dan/sedang mereka||tidak||mereka menyadari
words.en: And said||(the) wife||(of) Firaun||A comfort||(of the) eye||for me||and for you||(Do) not||kill him||perhaps||(that)||he may benefit us||or||we may take him||(as) a son||And they||(did) not||perceive

translations.text: Wa-qaalatim ra-atu Fir'awna qurratu aynil lee Wa-lak; laa taqtuloohu 'asaaa aien yanfa'anaa aw nattakhizahoo waladanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

words.id: dan menjadi||hati||ibu||Musa||kosong||sungguh||ia hampir||ia menyatakan||dengannya||jika tidak||bahwa||Kami teguhkan||atas||hatinya||supaya ia adalah||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: And became||(the) heart||(of the) mother||(of) Musa||empty||That||she was near||(to) disclosing||about him||if not||that||We strengthened||[over]||her heart||so that she would be||of||the believers

translations.text: Wa-asbaha fu'aadu ummi Moosaa faarighan in kaadat latubdee bihee law laaa arrabatnaa 'alaa qalbihaa litakoona minal mu'mineen

words.id: dan (ibu Musa) berkata||kepada saudara perempuannya (Musa)||selidikilah/ikutilah dia||maka ia melihat||dengannya (Musa)||dari||jauh||dan/sedang mereka||tidak||mereka menyadari
words.en: And she said||to his sister||Follow him||So she watched||him||from||a distance||while they||(did) not||perceive

translations.text: Wa-qaalat li-ukhtihee qusseehi fabasurat bihee 'an junubinw wahum laa yash'uroon

words.id: dan Kami haramkan/cegah||atasnya (Musa)||perempuan-perempuan yang menyusukan||dari||sebelum itu||maka ia berkata||apakah/maukah||aku tunjukkan kepadamu||atas||keluarga||rumah-tangga||akan memeliharanya||bagi kalian||dan mereka||kepadanya||berlaku jujur/baik
words.en: And We had forbidden||for him||the wet nurses||before||before||so she said||Shall I||direct you||to||(the) people||(of) a house||who will rear him||for you||while they||to him||(will be) sincere

translations.text: Wa-harramnaa alaihil maraadi'a min qablu faqaalat hal adullukum 'alaaa ahli baitiny yakfuloonahoo lakum Wa-hum lahoo naasihoon

words.id: maka Kami kembalikannya||kepada||ibunya||supaya||ia sejuk||matanya||dan ia tidak||bersedih hati||dan supaya ia mengetahui||bahwasanya||janji||Allah||benar||tetapi||kebanyakan mereka||tidak||mereka mengetahui
words.en: So We restored him||to||his mother||that||might be comforted||her eye||and not||she may grieve||and that she would know||that||the Promise of Allah||the Promise of Allah||(is) true||But||most of them||(do) not||know

translations.text: Faradadnaahu ilaa ummihee kai taqarra ainuhaa Wa-laa tahzana Wa-lita'lama anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

words.id: dan setelah||(Musa) sampai||umurnya/dewasanya||dan dia telah sempurna||Kami berikan kepadanya||hikmah||dan ilmu||dan demikianlah||Kami memberi balasan||orang-orang yang berbuat baik
words.en: And when||he reached||his full strength||and became mature||We bestowed upon him||wisdom||and knowledge||And thus||We reward||the good-doers

translations.text: Wa-lammaa balagha ashuddahoo wastawaaa aatai-naahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmaa; Wa-kazaalika najzil muhsineen

words.id: dan (Musa) masuk||kota||atas||sewaktu||lalai/lengah||dari||penduduknya||maka dia mendapatkan||di dalamnya (kota)||dua orang laki-laki||keduanya perang/berkelahi||ini (orang)||dari||golongannya||dan ini (orang)||dari||musuhnya||maka meminta tolong kepadanya||yang||dari||golongannya||atas||(orang) yang||dari||musuhnya||maka meninjunya||Musa||lalu menentukan/mati||atasnya (musuhnya)||(Musa) berkata||ini||dari||perbuatan||syaitan||sesungguhnya ia/syaitan||musuh||menyesatkan||yang nyata
words.en: And he entered||the city||at||a time||(of) inattention||of||its people||and found||therein||two men||fighting each other||this||of||his party||and this||of||his enemy||And called him for help||the one who||(was) from||his party||against||the one who||(was) from||his enemy||so struck him with his fist||Musa||and killed him||and killed him||He said||This (is)||of||(the) deed||(of) Shaitaan||Indeed, he||(is) an enemy||one who misleads||clearly

translations.text: Wa-dakhalal madeenata 'alaa heene ghaflatim min ahlihaa fawajada feeha raju-laini yaqtatilaani haazaa min shee'atihee Wa-haaza min aduwwihee fastaghaasahul lazee min shee'atihee 'alal lazee min aduwwihee fawakazahoo Moosaa faqadaa alaihi qaala haaza min amalish Shaitaani innahoo 'aduwwum mmudillum mubeen

words.id: (Musa) berkata||ya Tuhanku||sesungguhnya aku||aku telah menganiaya||diriku||maka ampunilah||aku||maka Dia mengampuni||padanya||sesungguhnya Dia/Allah||Dia||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: He said||My Lord!||Indeed I||[I] have wronged||my soul||so forgive||[for] me||Then He forgave||[for] him||Indeed He||He (is)||the Oft-Forgiving||the Most Merciful

translations.text: Qaala Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafara lah; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

words.id: (Musa) berkata||ya Tuhanku||dengan apa/nikmat||telah Engkau anugerahkan||atasku/kepadaku||maka aku tidak||menjadi||penolong||bagi orang-orang yang berdosa
words.en: He said||My Lord!||Because||You have favored||[on] me||so not||I will be||a supporter||(of) the criminals

translations.text: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa an'amta alaiya falan akoona zaheeral lilmujrimeen

words.id: maka jadilah dia/Musa||dalam||kota||ketakutan||dia menunggu-nunggu||maka tiba-tiba||(orang) yang||meminta tolong kepadanya||dengan kemarin||ia berteriak kepadanya||berkata||kepadanya||Musa||sesungguhnya kamu||benar-benar orang sesat||yang nyata
words.en: In the morning he was||in||the city||fearful||(and) was vigilant||when behold!||The one who||sought his help||the previous day||cried out to him for help||Said||to him||Musa||Indeed you||(are) surely a deviator||clear

translations.text: Fa-asbaha fil madeenati khaaa'ifaien yataraqqabu fa-izal lazis tansarahoo bil-amsi yastasrikhuh; qaala lahoo moosaaa innaka laghawiyyum mubeen

words.id: maka tatkala||dia||hendak/akan||dia||menyerang/memukul dengan keras||dengan/kepada orang yang||ia||musuh||bagi keduanya||ia berkata||wahai musa||apakah kamu hendak||kamu||membunuh aku||sebagaimana||kamu telah membunuh||seseorang||dengan kemarin||kamu tidak||bermaksud||melainkan||bahwa||kamu adalah||sewenang-wenang||di||bumi/negeri ini||dan tidaklah||kamu bermaksud||bahwa||kamu adalah||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang mengadakan perdamaian
words.en: Then when||[that]||he wanted||to||strike||the one who||[he] (was)||an enemy||to both of them||he said||O Musa!||Do you intend||to||kill me||as||you killed||a person||yesterday||Not||you want||but||that||you become||a tyrant||in||the earth||and not||you want||that||you be||of||the reformers

translations.text: Falammaaa an araada aien yabtisha billazee huwa 'aduwwul lahumaa qaala yaa-Moosaaa atureedu an taqtulanee kamaa qatalta nafsam bil-amsi in tureedu illaaa an takoona jabbaaram fil ardi Wa-maa tureedu an takoona minal musliheen

words.id: dan datanglah||seorang laki-laki||dari||ujung||kota||ia berjalan dengan cepat||ia berkata||wahai musa||sesungguhnya||pembesar||mereka berunding||dengan/tentang kamu||untuk membunuhmu||maka keluarlah kamu||sesungguhnya aku||kepadamu||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang memberi nasehat
words.en: And came||a man||from||(the) farthest end||(of) the city||running||He said||O Musa!||Indeed||the chiefs||are taking counsel||about you||to kill you||so leave||indeed I am||to you||of||the sincere advisors

translations.text: Wa-jaaa'a rajulum min aqsal madeenati yas'aa qaala yaa-Moosaaa innal mala-a yaa-tamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee laka minan naasiheen

words.id: maka dia keluar||dari padanya (kota itu)||dengan rasa takut||dia menunggu-nunggu||dia berkata (berdo'a)||ya Tuhanku||selamatkanlah aku||dari||kaum||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: So he left||from it||fearing||(and) vigilant||He said||My Lord!||Save me||from||the people||the wrongdoers

translations.text: Fakharaja minhaa khaaa'ifany yataraqqab; qaala Rabbi najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen

words.id: dan tatkala||dia menghadap/menuju||arah/jurusan||Madyan||dia berkata (berdo'a)||mudah-mudahan||Tuhanku||bahwa||Dia memberi petunjuk kepadaku||harus/benar||jalan
words.en: And when||he turned his face||towards||Madyan||he said||Perhaps||my Lord||[that]||will guide me||(to the) sound||way

translations.text: Wa-lammaa tawajjaha tilqaaa'a Madyana qaala 'asaa Rabbeee aien yahdiyanee Sawaaa'as Sabeel

words.id: dan tatkala||dia sampai||air||negeri Madyan||dia menjumpai||atasnya||suatu ummat (sekumpulan)||dari||manusia (orang)||mereka memberi minum||dan dia menjumpai||dari||selain mereka||dua orang wanita||keduanya menghambat/menahan||(Musa) berkata||apa||maksud kamu berdua||keduanya berkata (menjawab)||tidak||kami dapat memberi minum||sehingga||menghalau||penggembala-penggembala||dan bapak kami||lanjut usia||besar/tua
words.en: And when||he came||(to the) water||(of) Madyan||he found||on it||a group||of||men||watering||and he found||besides them||besides them||two women||keeping back||He said||What||(is the) matter with both of you||They said||We cannot water||We cannot water||until||take away||the shepherds||and our father||(is) a very old man||(is) a very old man

translations.text: Wa-lammaa warada maaa'a Madyana wajada alaihi ummatam minan naasi yasqoona Wa-wajada min doonihimum raataini tazoodaani qaala maa khatbukumaa qaalataa laa nasqee hatta yusdirar ri'aaa'u Wa-aboonaa shaikhun kabeer

words.id: maka (Musa) memberi minum||kepada keduanya||kemudian||dia berpaling/kembali||kepada/ke||tempat yang teduh||lalu dia berkata/berdo'a||ya Tuhanku||sesungguhnya aku||terhadap apa||Engkau turunkan||kepadaku||dari||kebaikan||sangat memerlukan
words.en: So he watered||for them||Then||he turned back||to||the shade||and said||My Lord!||Indeed I am||of whatever||You send||to me||of||good||(in) need

translations.text: Fasaqaa lahumaa summa tawallaaa ilaz zilli faqaala Rabbi innee limaaa anzalta ilaiya min khairin faqeer

words.id: maka datanglah kepadanya (Musa)||salah seorang dari keduanya||ia berjalan||atas/dengan||kemalu-maluan||ia berkata||sesungguhnya||bapakku||memanggil kamu||untuk memberi balasan kepadamu||upah||apa||yang kamu memberi minum||untuk kami||maka tatkala||(Musa) datang kepadanya||dan dia menceriterakan||atasnya/kepadanya||cerita||(Syu'aib) berkata||jangan||kamu takut||kamu telah selamat||dari||kaum||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: Then came to him||one of the two women||walking||with||shyness||She said||Indeed||my father||calls you||that he may reward you||(the) reward||(for) what||you watered||for us||So when||he came to him||and narrated||to him||the story||he said||(Do) not||fear||You have escaped||from||the people||the wrongdoers

translations.text: Fajaaa'at-hu ihdaahumaa tamshee 'alas tihyaaa'in qaalat inna abee yad'ooka li-yajziyaka ajra maa saqaita lanaa; falammaa jaaa'ahoo Wa-qassa alaihil qasasa qaala laa takhaf najawta minal qawmiz zaalimeen

words.id: berkata||salah seorang dari keduanya||wahai ayahku||ambillah upahan dia (sebagai buruh)||sesungguhnya||lebih baik||orang||engkau ambil upahan (sebagai buruh)||yang kuat||dapat dipercaya
words.en: Said||one of them||O my father!||Hire him||Indeed||(the) best||whom||you (can) hire||(is) the strong||the trustworthy

translations.text: Qaalat ihdaahumaa yaaa-abatis taajirhu inna khaira manis taajartal qawiyyul ameen

words.id: (Syu'aib) berkata||sesungguhnya aku||aku bermaksud||untuk||aku menikahkan kamu||salah seorang||kedua anak perempuanku||ini||atas||bahwa||kamu mengambil upah/bekerja padaku||delapan||tahun||maka jika||kamu sempurnakan||sepuluh||maka itu dari||sisimu/kemauanmu||dan aku tidak||bermaksud||bahwa||aku memberatkan||atasmu||kamu akan mendapatiku||jika||menghendaki||Allah||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang saleh/baik
words.en: He said||Indeed, I||[I] wish||to||marry you to||one||(of) my daughters||(of) these two||on||that||you serve me||(for) eight||years||but if||you complete||ten||then from||you||And not||I wish||to||make it difficult||for you||You will find me||if||Allah wills||Allah wills||of||the righteous

translations.text: Qaala innee ureedu an unkihaka ihdab nataiya haataini 'alaaa an taajuranee samaaniya hijaj; fa-in atmamta 'ashran famin indika Wa-maaa ureedu an ashuqqa alaik; satajiduneee in shaaa'al laahu minas saaliheen

words.id: (Musa) berkata||demikian itulah||antara aku||dan antara kamu||yang mana saja||dua waktu||aku sempurnakan||maka tidak ada||permusuhan/tuntutan||atasku||dan Allah||atas||apa yang||kita katakan/ucapkan||penjaga/menjadi saksi
words.en: He said||That||(is) between me||and between you||Whichever||(of) the two terms||I complete||then no||injustice||to me||and Allah||over||what||we say||(is) a Witness

translations.text: Qaala zaalika bainee Wa-bainaka aiyamal ajalaini qadaitu falaa 'udwaana alaiya wallaahu 'alaa ma naqoolu Wakeel

words.id: maka tatkala||telah menyempurnakan||Musa||waktu||dia berjalan dimalam hari||dengan keluarganya||dia melihat||dari||sebelah||gunung Thur||api||dia berkata||kepada keluarganya||tinggallah/diamlah kamu||sesungguhnya aku||aku telah melihat||api||mudah-mudahan aku||aku datang/membawa kepadamu||dari padanya||dengan berita||atau||bara/nyala||dari||api||agar kalian||kamu memanaskan badan
words.en: Then when||Musa fulfilled||Musa fulfilled||the term||and was traveling||with his family||he saw||in||(the) direction||(of) Mount Tur||a fire||He said||to his family||Stay here||indeed, I||[I] perceive||a fire||Perhaps||I will bring you||from there||some information||or||a burning wood||from||the fire||so that you may||warm yourselves

translations.text: Falammmaa qadaa Moosal ajala Wa-saara bi-ahliheee aanasa min jaanibit Toori naaran qaala li-ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la-'alleee aateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw jazwatim minan naari la-'allakum tastaloon

words.id: maka tatkala||dia mendatanginya/api||dia dipanggil||dari||pinggir||lembah||sebelah kanan||di||tempat||yang diberkati||dari||pohon kayu||bahwa||wahai musa||sesungguhnya Aku||Aku||Allah||Tuhan||semesta alam
words.en: But when||he came (to) it||he was called||from||(the) side||(of) the valley||the right||in||the place even||blessed||from||the tree||that||O Musa!||Indeed||I Am||Allah||(the) Lord||(of) the worlds

translations.text: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya min shaati'il waadil aimani fil buq'atil muubaarakati minash shajarati aien yaa-Moosaaa inneee Anal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen

words.id: dan sungguh||lemparkanlah||tongkatmu||maka tatkala||dia melihatnya||ia bergerak-gerak||seakan-akan ia||seekor ular||dia berpaling/lari||berbalik ke belakang||dan dia tidak||menoleh||wahai musa||datanglah kembali||dan jangan||takut||sesungguhnya kamu||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang aman
words.en: And [that]||throw||your staff||But when||he saw it||moving||as if it||(were) a snake||he turned||(in) flight||and (did) not||return||O Musa!||Draw near||and (do) not||fear||Indeed you||(are) of||the secure

translations.text: Wa-an alqi 'asaaka falam-maa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annnahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa aqbil Wa-laa takhaf innaka minal aamineen

words.id: masukkanlah||tanganmu||dalam||sakumu||ia akan keluar||putih||dari||selain/tidak||seburuk-buruk||dan dekapkanlah||kepadamu||sayapmu/tanganmu||dari||ketakutan||maka inilah/demikian itu||dua bukti (mukjizat)||dari||Tuhanmu||kepada||Fir'aun||dan pembesar-pembesarnya||sesungguhnya mereka||adalah mereka||kaum||orang-orang yang fasik
words.en: Insert||your hand||in||your bosom||it will come forth||white||without||without||any harm||And draw||to yourselves||your hand||against||fear||So these||(are) two evidences||from||your Lord||to||Firaun||and his chiefs||Indeed, they||are||a people||defiantly disobedient

translations.text: Usluk yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'inw wadmum ilaika janaahaka minar rahbi fazaanika burhaanaani mir Rabbika ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

words.id: (Musa) berkata||ya Tuhanku||sesungguhnya aku||aku telah membunuh||dari mereka||seorang||maka aku takut||bahwa||mereka akan membunuhku
words.en: He said||My Lord!||Indeed||I killed||of them||a man||and I fear||that||they will kill me

translations.text: Qaala Rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan fa-akhaafu aien yaqtuloon

words.id: dan saudaraku||Harun||dia||lebih fasih||daripada aku||lisan||maka utuslah dia||bersamaku||pembantu||dia membenarkan aku||sesungguhnya aku||aku takut||bahwa||mereka mendustakan aku
words.en: And my brother||Harun||he||(is) more eloquent||than me||(in) speech||so send him||with me||(as) a helper||who will confirm me||Indeed||I fear||that||they will deny me

translations.text: Wa-akhee Haaroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisaanan fa-arsilhu ma'iya rid-aien yusaddiquneee innee akhaafu aien yukazziboon

words.id: (Allah) berfirman||Kami akan meneguhkan/menguatkan||lenganmu||dengan saudaramu||dan Kami jadikan/berikan||kepadamu berdua||kekuasaan||maka tidak||mereka sampai||kepadamu berdua||dengan ayat/mukjizat Kami||kamu berdua||dan orang yang||mengikuti kamu berdua||orang-orang yang mengalahkan/menang
words.en: He said||We will strengthen||your arm||through your brother||and We will make||for both of you||an authority||so not||they will reach||to both of you||Through Our Signs||you two||and (those) who||follow you||(will) be the dominant

translations.text: Qaala sanashuddu 'adudaka bi-akheeka Wa-naj'alu lakumaa sultaanan falaa yasiloona ilaikumaa; bi-Aayaatinaa antumaa Wa-manit taba'akumal ghaaliboon

words.id: maka tatkala||datang kepada mereka||Musa||dengan ayat/mukjizat Kami||yang nyata||mereka berkata||tidak lain||ini||kecuali||sihir||dibuat-buat||dan kami tidak||mendengar||dengan ini||pada||bapak-bapak kami||terdahulu
words.en: But when||came to them||Musa||with Our Signs||clear||they said||Not||(is) this||except||a magic||invented||and not||we heard||of this||among||our forefathers||our forefathers

translations.text: Falammaa jaaa'ahum Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaaa illaa sihrum muftaranw Wa-maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen

words.id: dan berkata||Musa||Tuhanku||lebih mengetahui||dengan/kepada siapa||datang||dengan petunjuk||dari||sisi-Nya||dan siapa||adalah ia||baginya/mendapat||kesudahan||tempat (dunia)||sesungguhnya dia||tidak||beruntung/mendapat kemenangan||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: And Musa said||And Musa said||My Lord||knows best||of who||has come||with [the] guidance||from Him||from Him||and who||will be||for him||the good end in the Hereafter||the good end in the Hereafter||Indeed||not||will be successful||the wrongdoers

translations.text: Wa-qaala Moosaa Rabbeee a'alamu biman jaaa'a bilhudaa min indihee Wa-man takoonu lahoo aaqibatud daari innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon

words.id: dan berkata||Fir'aun||wahai||pembesar||aku tidak||mengetahui||bagi kalian||dari||Tuhan||selain aku||maka nyalakan api/bakar||untukku||hai Haman||atas||tanah liat||maka buatlah||untukku||menara||barangkali aku||aku melihat||kepada||Tuhan||Musa||dan sesungguhnya aku||benar-benar aku mengira dia||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang berdusta
words.en: And Firaun said||And Firaun said||O chiefs||O chiefs||Not||I know||for you||any||god||other than me||So kindle||for me||O Haman||Upon||the clay||and make||for me||a lofty tower||so that [I]||I may look||at||(the) God||(of) Musa||And indeed, I||[I] think that he||(is) of||the liars

translations.text: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu yaaa-aiyyuhal mala-u maa alimtu lakum min ilaahin ghairee fa-awqid lee yaa-Haamaanu 'alat teeni faj'al lee sarhal la'alleee attali'u ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa Wa-innee la-azunnuhoo minal kaazibeen

words.id: dan berlaku sombonglah||dia (Fir'aun)||dan bala tentaranya||di||bumi||dengan tidak||hak||dan mereka mengira||bahwasanya mereka||kepada kami||tidak||mereka dikembalikan
words.en: And he was arrogant||And he was arrogant||and his hosts||in||the land||without||right||and they thought||that they||to Us||not||will be returned

translations.text: Wastakbara huwa Wa-junooduhoo fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-zannooo annahum ilainaa laa yurja'oon

words.id: maka Kami ambil/siksa dia||dan bala tentaranya||lalu Kami lemparkan mereka||kedalam||laut||maka perhatikanlah||bagaimana||adalah||akibat/kesudahan||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: So We seized him||and his hosts||and We threw them||in||the sea||So see||how||was||(the) end||(of) the wrongdoers

translations.text: Fa-akhaznaahu Wa-junoo-dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi fanzur kaifa kaana aaqibatuz zaalimeen

words.id: dan Kami jadikan mereka||pemimpin-pemimpin||mereka menyeru||kepada||api neraka||dan pada hari||kiamat||tidak||mereka akan ditolong
words.en: And We made them||leaders||inviting||to||the Fire||and (on the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||not||they will be helped

translations.text: Wa-ja'alnaahum a'immataien yad'oona ilan Naari Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati laa yunsaroon

words.id: dan Kami ikutkan/iringkan mereka||dalam||ini||dunia||kutukan||dan pada hari||kiamat||mereka||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang dijelekkan
words.en: And We caused to follow them||in||this||world||a curse||and (on the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||they||(will be) of||the despised

translations.text: Wa-atba'naahum fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati hum minal maqbooheen

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah memberikan||Musa||Al Kitab||dari||sesudah||apa||Kami telah binasakan||kurun/generasi||awal/terdahulu||pandangan||bagi manusia||dan petunjuk||dan rahmat||agar mereka||mereka ingat
words.en: And verily||We gave||Musa||the Scripture||after [what]||after [what]||after [what]||We had destroyed||the generations||former||(as) an enlightenment||for the mankind||and a guidance||and mercy||that they may||remember

translations.text: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba mim ba'di maaa ahlaknal quroonal oolaa basaaa'ira linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal la'allahum yata-zakkkaroon

words.id: dan tidaklah||kamu berada||disebelah||barat||ketika||Kami putuskan/sampaikan||kepada||Musa||perkara/perintah||dan tidaklah||kamu berada||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang menyaksikan
words.en: And not||you were||on (the) side||western||when||We decreed||to||Musa||the Commandment||and not||you were||among||the witnesses

translations.text: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibil gharbiyyi iz qadainaaa ilaa Moosal amra Wa-maa kunta minash shaahideen

words.id: akan tetapi Kami||Kami telah menumbuhkan||generasi-generasi||maka panjanglah/berlalulah||atas mereka||umur/masa||dan tidaklah||kamu berada||berdiam/tinggal||dalam/bersama||penduduk||Madyan||kamu membacakan||atas mereka||ayat-ayat Kami||akan tetapi Kami||adalah Kami||mengutus Rasul-Rasul

translations.text: Wa-laakinnaa anshaanaa quroonan fatataawala alaihimul 'umur; Wa-maa kunta saawiyan feee ahli Madyana tatloo alaihim Aayaatinaa Wa-laakinnaa kunnaa mursileen

words.id: dan tidaklah||kamu berada||disebelah||gunung Tur||ketika||Kami menyeru||akan tetapi||rahmat||dari||Tuhanmu||supaya kamu memberi peringatan||kaum||belum||datang pada mereka||dari||pemberi peringatan||dari||sebelum kamu||agar mereka||mereka ingat

translations.text: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibit Toori iz naadainaa Wa-laakir rahmatam mir Rabbika litunzira qawmam maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yatazakkaroon

words.id: dan supaya tidak||bahwa/ketika||menimpa mereka||musibah/azab||dengan apa/sebab||mendahulukan/perbuatan||tangan-tangan mereka||lalu mereka berkata||ya Tuhan kami||mengapa tidak||Engkau mengutus||kepada kami||seorang Rasul||maka kami akan mengikuti||ayat-ayat Engkau||dan adalah/jadilah kami||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: And if not||[that]||struck them||a disaster||for what||had sent forth||their hands||and they would say||Our Lord!||Why not||You sent||to us||a Messenger||so we (could have) followed||Your Verses||and we (would) have been||of||the believers

translations.text: Wa-law-laaa an tuseebahum museebatum bimaa qaddamat aideehim fa-yaqooloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika Wa-nakoona minal mu'mineen

words.id: maka tatkala||datang kepada mereka||kebenaran||dari||sisi Kami||mereka berkata||mengapa tidak||diberikan||seperti||apa diberikan||diberikan||Musa||ataukah tidak||mereka ingkar||dengan/kepada apa||diberikan||Musa||dari||sebelum/dahulu||mereka berkata||dua ahli sihir||keduanya bantu membantu||dan mereka berkata||sesungguhnya kami||dengan/kepada masing-masing||ingkar/tidak mempercayai

translations.text: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min indinaa qaaloo law-laa ootiya misla maaa ootiyaa Moosaa; awalam yakfuroo bimaaa ootiya Moosaa min qablu qaaloo sihraani tazaaharaa Wa-qaalooo innaa bikullin kaafiroon

words.id: katakanlah||maka datangkanlah olehmu||dengan sebuah Kitab||dari||sisi||Allah||ia||lebih memberi petunjuk||daripada keduanya||aku mengikutinya||jika||kalian adalah||orang-orang yang benar
words.en: Say||Then bring||a Book||from Allah||from Allah||from Allah||which||(is) a better guide||than both of them||that I may follow it||if||you are||truthful

translations.text: Qul faatoo bi-Kitaabim min indil laahi huwa ahdaa minhu-maaa attabi'hu in kuntum saadiqeen

words.id: maka jika||tidak||mereka menjawab||kepadamu||maka ketahuilah||bahwasanya hanyalah||mereka mengikuti||hawa nafsu mereka||dan siapakah||lebih sesat||daripada orang||mengikuti||hawa nafsunya||dengan tidak||petunjuk||dari||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak||memberi petunjuk||kaum||orang-orang yang zalim

translations.text: Fa-il lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annamaa yattabi'oona ahwaaa'ahum; Wa-man adallu mimmanit taba'a hawaahu bighari hudam minal laah; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||telah Kami sampaikan||kepada mereka||perkataan||agar mereka||mereka ingat/mendapat pelajaran
words.en: And indeed||We have conveyed||to them||the Word||so that they may||remember

translations.text: Wa-laqad wassalnaa lahumul qawla la'allahum yatazakkaroon

words.id: orang-orang yang||Kami datangkan kepada mereka||Al-Qur'an||dari||sebelumnya||mereka||dengannya||mereka beriman
words.en: Those who||We gave them||the Scripture||before it||before it||they||in it||believe

translations.text: Allazeena aatainaahu-mul Kitaaba min qablihee hum bihee yu'minoon

words.id: dan apabila||dibacakan||atas mereka||mereka berkata||kami beriman||dengannya/kepadanya||sesungguhnya ia||benar||dari||Tuhan kami||sesungguhnya kami||adalah kami||dari||sebelumnya||orang-orang muslim

translations.text: Wa-izaa yutlaa alaihim qaaloo aamannaa biheee innahul haqqu mir rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa min qablihee muslimeen

words.id: mereka itu||diberi||pahala mereka||dua kali||dengan apa/sebab||mereka bersabar||dan mereka menolak||dengan kebaikan||kejahatan||dan sebagian dari apa||Kami telah rezekikan kepada mereka||mereka menafkahkan
words.en: Those||will be given||their reward||twice||because||they are patient||and they repel||with good||the evil||and from what||We have provided them||they spend

translations.text: Ulaaa'ika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimaa sabaroo Wa-yadra'oona bil-hasanatis saiyyi'ata Wa-mimmmaa razaq-naahum yunfiqoon

words.id: dan apabila||mereka mendengar||perkara yang sia-sia||mereka berpaling||dari padanya||dan mereka berkata||bagi kami||amal-amal kami||dan bagi kamu||amal-amal kamu||sejahtera||atas kalian||tidak||kami mau/ingin||orang-orang yang bodoh/jahil
words.en: And when||they hear||vain talk||they turn away||from it||and say||For us||our deeds||and for you||your deeds||Peace (be)||on you||not||we seek||the ignorant

translations.text: Wa-izaa sami'ul laghwa a'radoo 'anhu Wa-qaaloo lanaaa a'maalunaa Wa-lakum a'maalukum salaamun alaikum laa nabtaghil jaahileen

words.id: sesungguhnya kamu||tidak||kamu dapat memberi petunjuk||siapa/orang||kamu cintai/sukai||akan tetapi||Allah||memberi petunjuk||siapa/orang||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia||lebih mengetahui||dengan/kepada orang-orang yang mau menerima petunjuk
words.en: Indeed you||(can) not||guide||whom||you love||but||Allah||guides||whom||He wills||And He||(is) most knowing||(of) the guided ones

translations.text: innaka laa tahdee man ahbabta Wa-laakinnal laaha yahdee maien yashaaa'; Wa-huwa a'lamu bil-muhtadeen

translations.text: Wa-qaalooo in nattabi'il hudaa ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardinaa; awalam numakkkil lahum haraman aaminany yujbaaa ilaihi samaraatu kulli shai'ir rizqam mil ladunnaa Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

words.id: dan berapa (banyak)||Kami telah binasakan||dari||sesuatu negeri||subur/bersenang-senang||kehidupannya||maka itulah||tempat kediaman mereka||tidak||didiami||dari||sesudah mereka||kecuali||sedikit/kecil||dan Kami adalah||Kami||Pewaris
words.en: And how many||We have destroyed||of||a town||which exulted||(in) its means of livelihood||And these||(are) their dwellings||not||have been inhabited||after them||after them||except||a little||And indeed, [We]||We||(are) the inheritors

translations.text: Wa-kam ahlaknaa min qaryatim batirat ma'eeshatahaa fatilka masaakinuhum lam tuskam mim ba'dihim illaa qaleelaa; Wa-kunnaa Nahnul waariseen

words.id: dan tidak||ada||Tuhanmu||membinasakan||negeri||sehingga/sebelum||Dia mengutus||di||ibu (kota)nya||seorang Rasul||dia membacakan||atas mereka||ayat-ayat Kami||dan tidak||ada Kami||membinasakan||negeri||kecuali||dan penduduknya||mereka melakukan kezaliman

translations.text: Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka muhlikal quraa hattaa yab'asa feee ummihaa Rasoolany yatloo alaihim aayaatina; Wa-maa kunnaa muhlikil quraaa illaa Wa-ahluhaa zaalimoon

translations.text: Wa-maaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa Wa-zeenatuhaa; Wa-maa indal laahi khairunw Wa-abqaa; afalaa ta'qiloon

words.id: apakah orang||Kami janjikan kepadanya||janji||yang baik||lalu dia||menemuinya||seperti orang||Kami beri kesenangan dia||kesenangan||kehidupan||duniawi||kemudian||dia||pada hari||kiamat||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang dihadirkan

translations.text: Afamanw wa'adnaahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laaqeehi kamam matta'naahu mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa summa huwa Yawmal Qiyaamati minal muhdareen

words.id: dan pada hari itu||Dia memanggil mereka||lalu Dia berfirman||dimanakah||sekutu-sekutuKu||orang-orang yang||kalian adalah||kamu sangkakan/katakan
words.en: And (the) Day||He will call them||and say||Where||(are) My partners||whom||you used (to)||claim

translations.text: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa-'iyal lazeena kuntum taz'umoon

words.id: berkatalah||orang-orang yang||berhak||atas mereka||perkataan (hukuman)||ya Tuhan kami||mereka inilah||orang-orang yang||kami sesatkan||kami sesatkan mereka||sebagaimana||kami sesat||kami berlepas diri||kepada Engkau||tidak ada||mereka||kepada kami||mereka menyembah

translations.text: Qaalal lazeena haqqa alaihimul qawlu Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aghwainaa aghwainaahu kamaa ghawainaa tabarraanaaa ilaika maa kaanoo iyyaanaa ya'budoon

words.en: And it will be said||Call||your partners||And they will call them||but not||they will respond||to them||and they will see||the punishment||If only||[that] they||had been||guided!

translations.text: Wa-qeelad 'oo shurakaaa'akum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum Wa-ra-awul 'azaab; law annahum kaanoo yahtadoon

words.id: dan pada hari||Dia memanggil mereka||lalu Dia berfirman||apakah||jawabanmu||para Rasul
words.en: And (the) Day||He will call them||and say||What||did you answer||the Messengers

translations.text: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu maazaaa ajabtumul mursaleen

words.id: maka buta/gelap||atas mereka||semua berita||pada hari itu||maka mereka||tidak||saling bertanya
words.en: But (will) be obscure||to them||the information||that day||so they||will not ask one another||will not ask one another

translations.text: Fa'amiyat alaihimul ambaaa'u Yawma'izin fahum laa yatasaaa'aloon

words.id: maka adapun||orang||dia bertaubat||dan dia beriman||dan dia beramal||kebajikan/saleh||maka mudah-mudahan||bahwa||dia adalah||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang beruntung
words.en: But as for||(him) who||repented||and believed||and did||righteousness||then perhaps||[that]||he will be||of||the successful ones

translations.text: Fa-ammaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa'asaaa ai yakoona minal mufliheen

words.id: dan Tuhanmu||Dia menciptakan||apa||yang Dia kehendaki||dan Dia memilih||tidak||ada||bagi mereka||pilihan||Maha Suci||Allah||dan Maha Tinggi||dari apa||mereka persekutukan
words.en: And your Lord||creates||what||He wills||and chooses||Not||they have||for them||the choice||Glory be||(to) Allah||and High is He||above what||they associate (with Him)

translations.text: Wa-Rabbuka yakhuluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-yakhtaar; maa kaana lahumul khiyarah; Subhannal laahi Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammmaa yushrikoon

words.id: dan Tuhanmu||Dia mengetahui||apa||yang menyembunyikan||dada mereka||dan apa||mereka lahirkan
words.en: And your Lord||knows||what||conceals||their breasts||and what||they declare

translations.text: Wa-Rabbuka ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum Wa-maa yu'linoon

words.id: dan Dia||Allah||tidak ada||Tuhan||kecuali||Dia||bagi-Nya||segala puji||dalam/di||permulaan/dunia||dan di akhirat||dan bagi-Nya||segala hukum (penentuan)||dan kepada-Nya||kalian dikembalikan
words.en: And He||(is) Allah||(there is) no||god||but||He||To Him||(are due) all praises||in||the first||and the last||And for Him||(is) the Decision||and to Him||you will be returned

translations.text: Wa-Huwal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa lahul hamdu fil oolaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-lahul hukmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

words.id: katakanlah||apakah pendapatmu||jika||menjadikan||Allah||atas kalian||malam||terus menerus||sampai||hari||kiamat||siapakah||Tuhan||selain||Allah||mendatangkan kepadamu||dengan cahaya (sinar terang)||apakah maka tidak||kamu mendengar
words.en: Say||Have you seen||if||Allah made||Allah made||for you||the night||continuous||till||(the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||who||(is the) god||besides||Allah||who could bring you||light||Then will not||you hear

translations.text: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu alaikumul laila sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaa-teekum bidiyaaa'in afalaa tasma'oon

words.id: katakanlah||apakah pendapatmu||jika||menjadikan||Allah||atas kalian||siang||terus-menerus||sampai||hari||kiamat||siapakah||Tuhan||selain||Allah||mendatangkan kepadamu||dengan malam||kamu berdiam/beristirahat||di dalamnya||apakah maka tidak||kamu memperhatikan/melihat
words.en: Say||Have you seen||if||Allah made||Allah made||for you||the day||continuous||till||(the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||who||(is the) god||besides||Allah||who could bring you||night||(for) you (to) rest||in it||Then will not||you see

translations.text: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu alaikumun nahaara sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaateekum bilailin taskunoona feehi afalaa tubsiroon

words.id: dan dari/karena||rahmat-Nya||Dia menjadikan||bagi kalian||malam||dan siang||supaya kamu beristirahat||di dalamnya||dan supaya kamu mencari||dari||karunianya||dan agar kamu||kalian bersyukur
words.en: And from||His Mercy||He made||for you||the night||and the day||that you may rest||therein||and that you may seek||from||His Bounty||and so that you may||be grateful

translations.text: Wa-mir rahmatihee ja'ala lakumul laila wannahaara litaskunoo feehi Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

words.id: dan pada hari||Dia memanggil mereka||lalu Dia berfirman||dimanakah||sekutu-sekutuKu||orang-orang yang||kalian adalah||kamu sangkakan/katakan
words.en: And (the) Day||He will call them||and say||Where||(are) My partners||whom||you used (to)||claim

translations.text: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tazz'umoon

words.id: dan Kami cabut||dari||tiap-tiap||ummat||seorang saksi||maka Kami katakan||unjukkan/kemukakan||bukti-buktimu||maka mereka mengetahui||bahwasanya||kebenaran||bagi/kepunyaan Allah||dan sesat/hilang||dari mereka||apa||yang mereka adalah||mereka ada-adakan
words.en: And We will draw forth||from||every||nation||a witness||and We will say||Bring||your proof||Then they will know||that||the truth||(is) for Allah||and (will be) lost||from them||what||they used (to)||invent

translations.text: Wa-naza'naa min kulli ummatin shaheedan faqulnaa haatoo burhaanakum fa'alimooo annal haqqa lillaahi Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

words.id: sesungguhnya||Karun||adalah||dari||kaum||Musa||lalu dia berbuat aniaya||atas mereka||dan Kami telah memberikannya||dari||perbendaharaan||apa (harta)||sesungguhnya||kuncinya||sungguh berat||dengan golongan/sejumlah||orang yang mempunyai||kekuatan||ketika||berkata||kepadanya||kaumnya||jangan||kamu gembira/bangga||sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak||Dia menyukai||orang-orang yang membanggakan diri
words.en: Indeed||Qarun||was||from||(the) people||(of) Musa||but he oppressed||[on] them||And We gave him||of||the treasures||which||indeed||(the) keys of it||would burden||a company (of men)||possessors of great strength||possessors of great strength||When||said||to him||his people||(Do) not||exult||Indeed||Allah||(does) not||love||the exultant

translations.text: inna Qaaroona kaana min qawmi Moosaa fabaghaaa alaihim Wa-aatainaahu minal kunoozi maaa inna mafaati-hahoo latanooo'u bil'usbati ulil quwwati iz qaala lahoo qawmuhoo laa tafrah innal laahaa laa yuhibbul fariheen

words.id: dan carilah||pada apa||telah memberikan kepadamu||Allah||rumah/kampung||akhirat||dan jangan||kamu melupakan||bahagianmu||dari||dunia||dan berbuat baiklah||sebagaimana||telah berbuat baik||Allah||kepadamu||dan janganlah||kamu mencari/berbuat||kerusakan||di||muka bumi||sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak||Dia menyukai||orang-orang yang berbuat kerusakan
words.en: But seek||through what||Allah has given you||Allah has given you||the home||(of) the Hereafter||and (do) not||forget||your share||of||the world||And do good||as||Allah has been good||Allah has been good||to you||And (do) not||seek||corruption||in||the earth||Indeed||Allah||(does) not||love||the corrupters

translations.text: Wabtaghi feemaaa aataakal laahud Daaral Aakhirata Wa-laa tansa naseebaka minad dunyaa Wa-ahsin kamaaa ahsanal laahu ilaika Wa-laa tabghil fasaada fil ardi innal laaha laa yuhibbul mufsideen

words.id: (Karun) berkata||sesungguhnya hanyalah||aku diberinya (harta itu)||atas||ilmu||disisiku/ada padaku||ataukah tidak||dia mengetahui||bahwasanya||Allah||sungguh||telah membinasakan||dari||sebelumnya||dari||kurun/ummat-ummat||orang||ia||lebih/sangat||dari padanya||kekuatan||dan lebih banyak||pengumpulan||dan tidak||ditanya||dari/tentang||dosa-dosa mereka||orang-orang yang berdosa
words.en: He said||Only||I have been given it||on (account)||(of) knowledge||I have||Did not||he know||that||Allah||indeed||destroyed||before him||before him||of||the generations||who||[they]||(were) stronger||than him||(in) strength||and greater||(in) accumulation||And not||will be questioned||about||their sins||the criminals

translations.text: Qaala innamaaa ootee-tuhoo 'alaa ilmin indeee; awalam ya'lam annal laaha qad ahlaka min qablihee minal qurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatanw Wa-aksaru jam'aa; Wa-laa yus'alu 'an zunoobihimul mujrimoon

words.id: maka dia keluar||atas/kepada||kaumnya||dalam||perhiasan/kemegahan||berkata||orang-orang yang||(mereka) menghendaki||kehidupan||dunia||seandainya||bagi kita (kita mempunyai)||seperti||apa||diberikan||Karun||sesungguhnya dia||benar-benar mempunyai||nasib baik/peruntungan||yang besar
words.en: So he went forth||to||his people||in||his adornment||Said||those who||desire||the life||(of) the world||O! Would that||for us||(the) like||(of) what||has been given||(to) Qarun||Indeed he||(is the) owner||(of) fortune||great

translations.text: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee fee zeenatih; qaalal lazeena yureedoonal hayaatad dunyaa yaalaita lanaa misla maaa ootiya Qaaroonu innahoo lazoo hazzin 'azeem

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||(mereka) diberi||ilmu||kecelakaan kamu||pahala||Allah||lebih baik||bagi orang||ia beriman||dan beramal||kebajikan/saleh||dan tidak||ditemuinya/diperolehnya||kecuali||orang-orang yang sabar
words.en: But said||those who||were given||the knowledge||Woe to you!||(The) reward||(of) Allah||(is) better||for (he) who||believes||and does||righteous (deeds)||And not||it is granted||except||(to) the patient ones

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul ilma wailakum sawaabul laahi khairul liman aamana Wa-'amila saalihaa; Wa-laa yulaq-qaahaaa illas saabiroon

words.id: maka Kami benamkan||dengannya||dan dengan rumahnya||bumi||maka tidak||ada||baginya||dari||golongan||mereka menolongnya||dari||selain||Allah||dan tidak||ada||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang dapat menolong
words.en: Then We caused to swallow up||him||and his home||the earth||Then not||was||for him||any||group||(to) help him||besides||besides||Allah||and not||was||(he) of||those who (could) defend themselves

translations.text: Fakhasafnaa bihee Wa-bidaarihil arda famaa kaana lahoo min fi'atien yansuroo-nahoo min doonil laahi Wa-maa kaana minal muntasireen

words.id: dan jadilah||orang-orang yang||(mereka) menginginkan||kedudukannya||dengan kemarin||mereka berkata||aduh||Allah||melapangkan||rezeki||bagi siapa||Dia kehendaki||dari||hamba-hamba-Nya||dan Dia menyempitkan||jika tidak||bahwa||karunia||Allah||atas kami||tentu Dia telah membenamkan||dengan kami||aduh||tidak||beruntung||orang-orang yang ingkar
words.en: And began||those who||(had) wished||his position||the day before||(to) say||Ah! That||Allah||extends||the provision||for whom||He wills||of||His slaves||and restricts it||If not||that||Allah had favored||Allah had favored||[to] us||He would have caused it to swallow us||He would have caused it to swallow us||Ah! That||not||will succeed||the disbelievers

translations.text: Wa-asbahal lazeena tamannaw makaanahoo bil-amsi yaqooloona waika-annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limaien ya-shaaa'u min ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru law-laaa am mannal laahu alainaa lakhasafa binaa waika-annahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon

words.id: itu||rumah/kampung||akhirat||Kami jadikannya||bagi orang-orang yang||tidak||(mereka) menghendaki||kesombongan diri||di||muka bumi||dan tidak||membuat kerusakan||dan akibat/kesudahan||bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa
words.en: That||the Home||(of) the Hereafter||We assign it||to those who||(do) not||desire||exaltedness||in||the earth||and not||corruption||And the good end||(is) for the righteous

translations.text: Tilkad Daarul Aakhiratu naj'aluhaa lillazeena laa yureedoona 'uluwwan fil ardi Wa-laa fasaadaa; wal-'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen

words.id: barangsiapa||datang||dengan kebaikan||maka baginya||lebih baik||dari padanya||dan barangsiapa||datang||dengan kejahatan||maka tidak||diberi balasan||orang-orang yang||(mereka) kerjakan||kejahatan||melainkan||apa||yang adalah||mereka kerjakan
words.en: Whoever||comes||with a good (deed)||then for him||(will be) better||than it||and whoever||comes||with an evil (deed)||then not||will be recompensed||those who||do||the evil (deeds)||except||what||they used (to)||do

translations.text: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa Wa-man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati falaa yujzal lazeena amilus saiyiaati illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon

words.id: sesungguhnya||yang||mewajibkan||atasmu||Al-Qur'an||benar-benar akan mengembalikan kamu||kepada||tempat kembali||katakanlah||Tuhanku||lebih mengetahui||orang||datang||dengan petunjuk||dan orang||ia||dalam||kesesatan||yang nyata
words.en: Indeed||He Who||ordained||upon you||the Quran||(will) surely take you back||to||a place of return||Say||My Lord||(is) most knowing||(of him) who||comes||with the guidance||and who||he||(is) in||an error||manifest

translations.text: innal lazee farada alaikal Qur-aana laraaadduka ilaa ma'aad; qur Rabbeee a'lamu man jaaa'a bil-hudaa Wa-man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen

words.id: dan tidak ada||kamu||kamu mengharap||bahwa||dijatuhkan/diturunkan||kepadamu||Kitab||melainkan||suatu rahmat||dari||Tuhanmu||maka janganlah||sekali-kali kamu menjadi||penolong||bagi orang-orang yang kafir
words.en: And not||you were||expecting||that||would be sent down||to you||the Book||except||(as) a mercy||from||your Lord||So (do) not||be||an assistant||to the disbelievers

translations.text: Wa-maa kunta tarjooo aien yulqaaa ilaikal Kitaabu illaa rahmatam mir Rabbika falaa takoonanna zaheeral lil-kaafireena

words.id: dan jangan||sekali-kali mereka menghalang-halangimu||dari||ayat-ayat||Allah||sesudah||tatkala||diturunkan||kepadamu||dan serulah||kepada||Tuhanmu||dan janganlah||sekali-kali kamu menjadi||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang mempersekutukan
words.en: And (let) not||avert you||from||(the) Verses||(of) Allah||after||[when]||they have been revealed||to you||And invite (people)||to||your Lord||And (do) not||be||of||the polytheists

translations.text: Wa-laa yasuddunnaka 'an Aayaatil laahi ba'da iz unzilat ilaika wad'u ilaa Rabbika Wa-laa takoonanna minal mushrikeen

words.id: dan jangan||kamu seru/sembah||beserta/disamping||Allah||Tuhan||yang lain||tidak ada||tuhan||melainkan||Dia||segala||sesuatu||binasa||kecuali||wajah/dzat-Nya||bagi-Nya||hukum/penentuan||dan kepadaNya||kalian dikembalikan
words.en: And (do) not||invoke||with||Allah||god||other||(There is) no||god||except||Him||Every||thing||(will be) destroyed||except||His Face||To Him||(is) the Decision||and to Him||you will be returned

translations.text: Wa-laa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; kullu shai'in haalikun illaa Wajhah; lahul hukkmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
